```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(mapview)
library(sf)

tmp_sites <- readRDS("../data/flux_data_kit_site-info.rds") %>%
  select(-date_start,-date_end,-koeppen_code_beck) %>%
  rename(
    'koeppen' = 'koeppen_code',
    'start' = 'year_start',
    'end' = 'year_end',
    'IGBP' = 'igbp_land_use'
  )
```

<center>
```{r echo = FALSE}
sites <- st_as_sf(tmp_sites, coords = c("lon","lat"), crs = 4326)
mapview(sites)
```
</center>
<br><br>


```{r echo = FALSE}
knitr::kable(tmp_sites)
```
